forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Rain showers before 11pm, then showers and thunderstorms. Cloudy, with a low around 48. Northeast wind around 10 mph, with gusts as high as 23 mph. Chance of precipitation is 100%. New rainfall amounts between three quarters and one inch possible.

forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of rain showers before 5pm, then a chance of showers and thunderstorms. Mostly cloudy, with a high near 68. East wind around 7 mph. Chance of precipitation is 50%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

forecast.detailedForecast: Showers and thunderstorms likely. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 52. East northeast wind 2 to 7 mph. Chance of precipitation is 70%. New rainfall amounts between a tenth and quarter of an inch possible.

nubsNob.comments: Thank you for making 2024-25 another great season! Stay tuned for updates, we look forward to having you back next year.
